instructions:
APPLYING POLICIES TEST

You are about to start the "Applying Policies" test. For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the headset you have been provided. Make sure you have your headset on now and can hear these instructions.

During this test you will be shown a company’s policy and procedures regarding callers’ issues. After reading the policy, you should click on the "Listen to Caller" button to hear the telephone call. After the call is completed, you will be presented with a statement regarding the call. You will then need to choose whether the statement is "true", "false", or you "need more information from the caller to make this determination.

You will be able to read the policy before the call starts. When you feel you are ready to hear the call please click the button "Listen to Caller". Once you have played the call you may not repeat it.

After you have finished the question, click the "Next" button that will enable at the top right corner of the screen.

You do not need to enter any customer information during this test. You are only required to evaluate whether a company’s policy applies to each caller’s issue.

Good luck!

questions.policy: Customers who do not want to be contacted by our company can be removed from our contact database upon verification of their customer ID number.  Their reference number may also be used for verification.  A reference number or ID number is also required to make changes to personal information such as address, phone number, and email address.
questions.questionText: The customer can be removed from the contact database.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customers who are using the paper billing system automatically receive mailers from us for the first twelve months.  Customers who use the electronic billing system do not receive mailers from us.  When a customer wishes to sign up for the electronic billing system they should be directed to the billing department.
questions.questionText: This customer should be receiving mailers from our company.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: All of our products include a four month warranty.  Customers may purchase a 1-year warranty for 25% of the original price of the product if they have registered the product.  Customers whose products are out of warranty, but are not pleased with their product may be sent a replacement at no charge, but they are not eligible for a refund.
questions.questionText: his customer is eligible to receive a free replacement.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Prospects interested in our products are to be sent a free informational packet.  The packet may be sent via email or mailed to their home address.  Existing customers seeking information about upgrades or other changes in service are to be mailed the information at the address listed in their account.
questions.questionText: The prospect is eligible to receive the informational packet via email.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customers must fill out the change of address form on their bill when they move.  Customers who have not filled out the change of address form will be penalized for any late payments.  Address change forms may take up to two months to be processed.  Manual overrides may be performed when necessary.
questions.questionText: The customer is to be penalized for any late payments in the last 3 months.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Current subscribers of the 900-minute or greater plan are eligible to upgrade to new plans without paying the service fee.  New customers must pay an activation fee for plans of 700 minutes or less.  There is not a fee associated with switching to a lesser-minute plan unless an additional line is added.
questions.questionText: This customer would pay a service fee when upgrading to the 900-minute plan.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customers who pay for standard shipping are not eligible for a refund of the shipping cost.  Customers who paid for the 1-day, 2-day, or 3-day shipping and do not receive their order on time are to receive a full refund of their shipping cost.  Customers whose packages are lost in the mail are to receive a replacement with 1-day shipment free of charge.
questions.questionText: This customer's package should have been received by now and should be considered late or lost.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customer feedback must be recorded in the customer feedback database for each type of complaint or compliment.  Customers who provide negative feedback may be offered discounts on future purchases of our products.  Pleased customers should be told about future products and upcoming releases.
questions.questionText: This customer should be offered discounts on future product purchases.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customers and prospects who have questions regarding pricing of new services, upgrades, or maintenance services should be forwarded to sales agents for follow up.  Customers who wish to cancel their software should be offered a partial-refund.  Customers using version 3 or older of our software are eligible for a free upgrade.
questions.questionText: This customer should be given a partial-refund.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Online orders placed before 1:00 PM will be processed for shipment the same day (Monday-Thursday); orders placed after 1:00 PM will be processed for shipment the following day.  Orders placed on Fridays, weekends, and holidays will be processed on the next business day.
questions.questionText: The customer's shipment will be processed for shipment the same day.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: New customers are to receive their cable installations within 3 business days of their sign up date.  Customers upgrading, downgrading, or making other changes to their cable package are to receive a service appointment within 5 business days of their request.  Rush requests are to be made for the next business day, and the customer is to be charged $50 on their next month's bill.
questions.questionText: This customer should receive their service appointments in the next 5 business days.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Appointments for service are given equal priority in scheduling.  Persons requesting appointments are offered the 'next available' appointment as long as a technician is available.  Customers preferring to work with a particular technician must schedule their appointment directly with the technician.  Representatives cannot make personal technician appointments.
questions.questionText: The customer's appointment can be booked for Wednesday.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customers requesting information about their service plan must provide their reference number as well as their first and last name to verify the security of their account.  They may instead verify the amount on their last bill to ensure their account security.  Making changes to plans also requires security verification.
questions.questionText: The customer may switch their cell phone plan.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Billing questions that are general in nature (e.g., interest rates, due dates) are to be answered by the call taker.  Specific billing questions (e.g., account balances, transaction issues) are to be handled by a billing agent.  Questions regarding credit card fraud or other fraudulent activity are to be forwarded directly to the manager on duty.
questions.questionText: This issue should be resolved by the call taker.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Callers with technical support questions should be directed to the support website first.  If they are not willing or able to look there first, or they have already visited the FAQ page and could not find the answer to their question, transfer the call to a technical support agent.  Calls from contractors regarding technical issues are to be transferred to the manager on duty.
questions.questionText: This caller should be transferred to the technical support department.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

questions.policy: Customer inquiries involving company products should first be directed to the product information page of the company website. In the event that a customer does not have internet access, product information should then be mailed to the customer's address.
questions.questionText: The customer should be directed to the product information page of the company website.

options.text: True (the necessary information has been provided by the caller)
False (even with more information the statement will still be false)
Need more information from the customer to determine whether true or false

Customers whose products are out of warranty, but are not pleased with their product may be sent a replacement at no charge, but they are not eligible for a refund

questions.policy: New customers are eligible to receive a 50% discount on the upgrade to premium service within the first 90 days of their plan. Following these initial 90 days, standard upgrade fees will apply.
questions.questionText: The customer is eligible to receive a 50% discount on the upgrade to premium service.
